```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df_deliveries <- read.csv('deliveries.csv')
df_matches <- read.csv('matches.csv')
```
How many rows and attributes? 
In matches csv-
```{r}
print(nrow(df_matches))
print(ncol(df_matches))

```
In deliveries csv-
```{r}
print(nrow(df_deliveries))
print(ncol(df_deliveries))
```
How many missing data and outliers?
```{r}
print(sum(is.na(df_matches)))
print(sum(is.na(df_deliveries)))
```
```{r}
dat <- duplicated(df_deliveries$match_id)
sum(dat)
```
